Requirement: A weapon with the Reach trait.

With weapon and arm outstretched toward your opponents, you are prepared to out-range them, piercing defences the moment they get close.

Pros

Personal Bubble

  • When a creature enters your attack range, you can use your reaction to make an opportunity attack against it.
Spin Attack
  • In place of an attack, you can swing your weapon around you in a circle. All creatures within 10ft of you must make a Dexterity (Save) check of DC 10 + Attack Modifier. On a fail, the creature takes damage equal to weaponâ€™s damage modifier. The creature takes half damage on success.

Cons

Aphenphosmphobia

  • You have -2 to hit creatures within 5ft of you.
  • Creatures within 5ft of you have +2 to the Dexterity (Save) check from Spin Attack.
